data.name: AddRangeToCollection_Collection_Description
data.value: The collection that will receive the new items.

data.name: AddRangeToCollection_Description
data.value: Adds a set of items to the specified collection.

data.name: AddRangeToCollection_DisplayName
data.value: Add Range To Collection

data.name: AddRangeToCollection_ErrorMsg_CollectionNull
data.value: The Collection property value cannot be null.

data.name: AddRangeToCollection_ErrorMsg_ItemsNull
data.value: The Items property value cannot be null.

data.name: AddRangeToCollection_Items_Description
data.value: The items to be added to the collection.

data.name: AesAlgorithmEncryption_DisplayName
data.value: AES

data.name: AesGcmAlgorithmEncryption_DisplayName
data.value: AES GCM

data.name: Aggregate_Columns_Description
data.value: The column indexes or column names to apply the aggregation. If not specified, the aggregation will be applied in all possible columns.

data.name: Aggregate_Description
data.value: Aggregates the DataTable data by the specified function resulting in a DataRow, product of this aggregation.

data.name: Aggregate_Function_Description
data.value: The aggregate function.

data.name: Aggregate_InputDataTable_Description
data.value: The data table which the aggregate function will be applied.

data.name: Aggregate_Result_Description
data.value: An object array containing the result of the aggregation.

data.name: CheckPoint_Data_Description
data.value: A collection of key/value pairs that provide additional user-defined information about the exception.

data.name: CheckPoint_Description
data.value: Checks if a given expression is true, if not, thrown the specified exception.

data.name: CheckPoint_DisplayName
data.value: Check Point

data.name: CheckPoint_Exception_Description
data.value: The exception that will be thrown if the expression is not true.

data.name: CheckPoint_Expression_Description
data.value: The expression to be evaluated.

data.name: CleanUpFolder_DeleteEmptyFolders_Description
data.value: Determines if the left empty folders after files deletion must also be deleted. Default is true.

data.name: CleanUpFolder_Description
data.value: Deletes all files and folders from a specified folder.

data.name: CleanUpFolder_DisplayName
data.value: Clean Up Folder

data.name: CleanUpFolder_Folder_Description
data.value: The folder path to be cleaned up.

data.name: CleanUpFolder_LastWriteTime_Description
data.value: Deletes only the files with last write time till this reference date. Default is DateTime.Now.

data.name: CleanUpFolder_Result_Description
data.value: An object containing the number of files deleted, folders deleted and total deleted.

data.name: CleanUpFolder_SearchPattern_Description
data.value: The search string to match against the names of files in path. This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions. It also supports a collection of strings. Default value is "*.*".

data.name: Common_Category
data.value: Common

data.name: Common_ContinueOnError
data.value: If set, continue executing the remaining activities even if the current activity has failed.

data.name: Common_Timeout
data.value: Specifies the amount of time in milliseconds to wait for the activity to run before an error is thrown. The default value is 30000 (30s).

data.name: Container_Description
data.value: Its a wrapper that when combined with Exit Activity, interrupts the children execution flow exiting the Container beforehand.

data.name: CultureScope_CultureName_Description
data.value: The desired culture, eg.: en-US, pt-BR, jp-JP, etc.

data.name: CultureScope_Description
data.value: A container that allows you to run a set of activities over a different culture.

data.name: CultureScope_DisplayName
data.value: Culture Scope

data.name: DataRowToDictionary_Description
data.value: Converts a DataRow to Dictionary.

data.name: DataRowToDictionary_DisplayName
data.value: DataRow To Dictionary

data.name: DataRowToDictionary_InputDataRow_Description
data.value: The input DataRow.

data.name: DataRowToDictionary_Result_Description
data.value: The output Dictionary.

data.name: DataTableEncryption_Action_Description
data.value: Determines if is to encrypt or decrypt the input value.

data.name: DataTableEncryption_Columns_Description
data.value: The column indexes or column names to be decrypted.

data.name: DataTableEncryption_Description
data.value: Provides methods to encrypt or decrypt the values of a DataTable using a specified algorithm and key.

data.name: DataTableEncryption_DisplayName
data.value: DataTable Encryption

data.name: DataTableEncryption_Input_Description
data.value: The DataTable to encrypt or decrypt.

data.name: DataTableEncryption_Key_Description
data.value: The key to be use. Can be a string or a SecureString.

data.name: DataTableEncryption_ParallelProcessing_Description
data.value: Uses parallel processing to scan through the DataTable and decrypt the data. Although this can drastically increase the processing speed, the rows in the resulting DataTable may have its order changed. Combine it with Sort property to reorder the DataTable when necessary.

data.name: DataTableEncryption_Result_Description
data.value: The encrypted or decrypted DataTable.

data.name: DataTableEncryption_Sort_Description
data.value: Sets the sort column or columns, and sort order for the output DataTable. The value must be a string that contains the column name followed by "ASC" (ascending) or "DESC" (descending). Columns are sorted ascending by default. Multiple columns can be separated by commas.

data.name: DataTableEncryption_TextEncoding_Description
data.value: The encoding used to interpret the data and key.

data.name: DataTableToText_DataTable_Description
data.value: The DataTable.

data.name: DataTableToText_DateTimeFormat_Description
data.value: The date format to be used on the string representation for DateTime column types.

data.name: DataTableToText_Description
data.value: Returns a string representation of a datatable on the specified text format (HTML, JSON or XML).

data.name: DataTableToText_DisplayName
data.value: DataTable To Text

data.name: DataTableToText_Result_Description
data.value: The string representation of the DataTable.

data.name: DataTableToText_TextFormat_Description
data.value: The text format.

data.name: Decrement_Description
data.value: Decrements the value of a variable by the specified decrement value.

data.name: Decrement_ErrorMsg_MinValue
data.value: The decrement value cannot be smaller than 1.

data.name: Decrement_Value_Description
data.value: The decrement value.

data.name: Decrement_Variable_Description
data.value: The variable to decrement.

data.name: DESAlgorithmEncryption_DisplayName
data.value: DES

data.name: DictionaryToDataTable_Description
data.value: Converts a Dictionary to DataTable.

data.name: DictionaryToDataTable_DisplayName
data.value: Dictionary To DataTable

data.name: DictionaryToDataTable_InputDictionary_Description
data.value: The input Dictionary.

data.name: DictionaryToDataTable_Result_Description
data.value: The output DataTable.

data.name: EncryptionBase_ErrorMsg_AlgorithmMissing
data.value: An algorithm is required.

data.name: EnumerateFiles_Description
data.value: Returns an enumerable collection of full file names that match a search pattern (or collection of patterns) and enumeration options in a specified path (or collection of paths).

data.name: EnumerateFiles_DirectoryPath_Description
data.value: The relative or absolute path (or collection of paths) to the directory (or directories) to search.

data.name: EnumerateFiles_DisplayName
data.value: Enumerate Files

data.name: EnumerateFiles_Exclusions_Description
data.value: Excludes from the enumeration the files with any of the specified attributes.

data.name: EnumerateFiles_Result_Description
data.value: An enumerable collection of the full names (including paths) for the files in the directory specified by path and that match the specified search pattern and option.

data.name: EnumerateFiles_SearchOption_Description
data.value: Specifies whether the search operation should include only the current directory or should include all subdirectories.

data.name: EnumerateFiles_SearchPattern_Description
data.value: The search string to match against the names of files in path. This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions. It also supports a collection of strings. Default value is "*.*".

data.name: Exit_Condition_Description
data.value: Condition which determines if the activity will be evaluated. If empty it assumes True.

data.name: Exit_Description
data.value: Exits from the Container or Iterate Activities interrupting any child executions after it.

data.name: ExtractDataColumnValues_Column_Description
data.value: The column name or index where the values will be extracted from.

data.name: ExtractDataColumnValues_DataTable_Description
data.value: The data table where the values will be extracted from.

data.name: ExtractDataColumnValues_DefaultValue_Description
data.value: The value to be use in case of the extract value cannot be converted to the specified type.

data.name: ExtractDataColumnValues_Description
data.value: Returns an array with all values of a respective data column.

data.name: ExtractDataColumnValues_DisplayName
data.value: Extract Data Column Values

data.name: ExtractDataColumnValues_ErrorMsg_InvalidColumnIndex
data.value: The column index '{0}' does not exist on the DataTable.

data.name: ExtractDataColumnValues_ErrorMsg_InvalidColumnName
data.value: The column '{0}' does not exist on the DataTable.

data.name: ExtractDataColumnValues_Result_Description
data.value: The array of values extracted from the data column.

data.name: ExtractDataColumnValues_TypeArgument_Description
data.value: Determines the type of each value extracted from the data column.

data.name: Increment_Description
data.value: Increments the value of a variable by the specified increment value.

data.name: Increment_ErrorMsg_MinValue
data.value: The increment value cannot be smaller than 1.

data.name: Increment_Value_Description
data.value: The increment value.

data.name: Increment_Variable_Description
data.value: The variable to be incremented.

data.name: InputOutput_Category
data.value: Reference

data.name: Input_Category
data.value: Input

data.name: IsTrue_Description
data.value: Performs a boolean evaluation of a value or expression.

data.name: IsTrue_DisplayName
data.value: Is True

data.name: IsTrue_Result_Description
data.value: The result of the evaluation.

data.name: IsTrue_Value_Description
data.value: The value or expression to be evaluated.

data.name: Iterate_Description
data.value: Iterates the activity execution for the specified number of times.

data.name: Iterate_ErrorMsg_IterationsMinValue
data.value: Iterations must have a value greater than zero.

data.name: Iterate_Index_Description
data.value: The zero-based iteration index.

data.name: Iterate_Iterations_Description
data.value: The number of iterations that must be run.

data.name: Iterate_Reverse_Description
data.value: Reverses the order of the output index.

data.name: Next_Condition_Description
data.value: Condition which determines if the activity will be evaluated. If empty it assumes True.

data.name: Next_Description
data.value: Skips the current iteration in an Iterate activity and proceeds the execution with the next iteration.

data.name: Options_Category
data.value: Options

data.name: Output_Category
data.value: Output

data.name: PromoteHeaders_AutoRename_Description
data.value: When true, it avoids the "column name already belongs to DataTable" error by adding a numeric suffix to it.

data.name: PromoteHeaders_Description
data.value: Promotes the first row of values to new column headers.

data.name: PromoteHeaders_DisplayName
data.value: Promote Headers

data.name: PromoteHeaders_EmptyColumnName_Description
data.value: Replaces an empty column name by the value of this property.

data.name: PromoteHeaders_ErrorMsg_NoData
data.value: There is no rows in the input data table to promote.

data.name: PromoteHeaders_InputDataTable_Description
data.value: The input DataTable.

data.name: PromoteHeaders_Result_Description
data.value: The output DataTable.

data.name: RC2AlgorithmEncryption_DisplayName
data.value: RC2

data.name: RemoveDataColumns_Columns_Description
data.value: The column names or column indexes to be removed. Can be either a collection of string or int.

data.name: RemoveDataColumns_Description
data.value: Removes the specified columns from a DataTable

data.name: RemoveDataColumns_DisplayName
data.value: Remove Data Columns

data.name: RemoveDataColumns_ReferenceDataTable_Description
data.value: The DataTable object from which the columns is to be removed.

data.name: RemoveDataColumns_ReferenceDataTable_DisplayName
data.value: DataTable

data.name: RemoveDuplicateRows_Columns_Description
data.value: The column names or column indexes to be analyzed on duplicate rows comparison. Can be either a collection of string or int.

data.name: RemoveDuplicateRows_Description
data.value: Removes the duplicate rows from a DataTable keeping only the first occurrence. Allows specify a limited number of columns for this comparison.

data.name: RemoveDuplicateRows_DisplayName
data.value: Remove Duplicate Rows

data.name: RemoveDuplicateRows_InputDataTable_Description
data.value: The DataTable to remove duplicated rows.

data.name: RemoveDuplicateRows_Result_Description
data.value: The output DataTable with the distinct rows.

data.name: RemoveEmptyRows_Columns_Description
data.value: The column indexes or column names to verify.

data.name: RemoveEmptyRows_CustomOptions_Category
data.value: Options (Custom Mode)

data.name: RemoveEmptyRows_Description
data.value: Removes the empty rows from a DataTable.

data.name: RemoveEmptyRows_DisplayName
data.value: Remove Empty Rows

data.name: RemoveEmptyRows_InputDataTable_Description
data.value: The input DataTable.

data.name: RemoveEmptyRows_Mode_Description
data.value: Determines when a row should be removed. (All) means that all columns must be empty to remove the row. (Any) for any column empty and (Custom) for the user defined rules.

data.name: RemoveEmptyRows_Operator_Description
data.value: Determines the evaluation condition for the specified columns where (And) checks if all columns are empty and (Or) checks if any of the columns are empty.

data.name: RemoveEmptyRows_Result_Description
data.value: The output DataTable.

data.name: RijndaelAlgorithmEncryption_DisplayName
data.value: Rijndael

data.name: Stopwatch_Description
data.value: Provides a set of methods and properties that you can use to accurately measure elapsed time.

data.name: Stopwatch_Method_Description
data.value: Determines which method must be invoked by activity.

data.name: Stopwatch_ReferenceStopwatch_Description
data.value: A variable that represents the instance of System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch class.

data.name: Stopwatch_ReferenceStopwatch_DisplayName
data.value: Stopwatch

data.name: SymmetricAlgorithmEncryptionBase_Iterations_Description
data.value: The number of iterations for the operation.

data.name: TextEncryption_Action_Description
data.value: Determines if is to encrypt or decrypt the input value.

data.name: TextEncryption_Description
data.value: Provides methods to encrypt or decrypt a text using a specified algorithm and key.

data.name: TextEncryption_DisplayName
data.value: Text Encryption

data.name: TextEncryption_Input_Description
data.value: The text to be encrypted or decrypted.

data.name: TextEncryption_Key_Description
data.value: The key to be use. Can be a string or a SecureString.

data.name: TextEncryption_Result_Description
data.value: The resulting string from the encrypt or decrypt operation.

data.name: TextEncryption_TextEncoding_Description
data.value: The encoding used to interpret the text and key.

data.name: TransposeData_Description
data.value: Transposes a DataTable by swapping its rows and columns so that rows become columns and columns become rows.

data.name: TransposeData_DisplayName
data.value: Transpose Data

data.name: TransposeData_InputDataTable_Description
data.value: The input DataTable to be transposed.

data.name: TransposeData_Result_Description
data.value: The output DataTable resulting of the transpose.

data.name: TripleDESAlgorithmEncryption_DisplayName
data.value: Triple DES

data.name: Unzip_Description
data.value: Decompress files from a zip archive.

data.name: Unzip_ErrorMsg_DirNameWithData
data.value: Zip entry name ends in directory separator character but contains data.

data.name: Unzip_ErrorMsg_OutsideDir
data.value: Extracting Zip entry would have resulted in a file outside the specified destination directory.

data.name: Unzip_ExtractTo_Description
data.value: The path to the folder where files will be extracted.

data.name: Unzip_Overwrite_Description
data.value: When true, overwrites an existing file that has the same name as the destination file.

data.name: Unzip_ZipFilePath_Description
data.value: The compressed file.

data.name: Validation_ScopeError
data.value: Cannot be used outside of {0} activity.

data.name: Validation_ScopesError
data.value: Cannot be used outside of {0} activities.

data.name: Validation_TypeError
data.value: Please provide a value of type {0} for {1}.

data.name: Validation_ValueError
data.value: Please provide a value for {0}.

data.name: WaitDynamicFile_Description
data.value: Waits until an unknown file be available by monitoring a specified folder.

data.name: WaitDynamicFile_DirectoryPath_Description
data.value: The directory to be monitored.

data.name: WaitDynamicFile_DisplayName
data.value: Wait Dynamic File

data.name: WaitDynamicFile_ErrorMsg_IntervalRange
data.value: The accepted range is from {0} and {1}. The value will be clamped.

data.name: WaitDynamicFile_FileInfo_Description
data.value: Returns the information about the file.

data.name: WaitDynamicFile_Interval_Description
data.value: Specifies the amount of time (in milliseconds) for the file re-check. Any values out of the range of 100-20000 milliseconds is reseted to its nearest limit. The default value is 500.

data.name: WaitDynamicFile_SearchPattern_Description
data.value: The search string to match against the names of files in path. This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions. It also supports a collection of strings. Default value is "*.*".

data.name: WaitDynamicFile_Timeout_Description
data.value: The maximum timeout to wait in milliseconds.

data.name: WaitFile_Description
data.value: Waits until the file be available.

data.name: WaitFile_DisplayName
data.value: Wait File

data.name: WaitFile_ErrorMsg_FilePathDoesNotExists
data.value: The specified file path does not exists.

data.name: WaitFile_ErrorMsg_IntervalRange
data.value: The accepted range is from {0} and {1}. The value will be clamped.

data.name: WaitFile_FileInfo_Description
data.value: (Optional) Returns the information about the file.

data.name: WaitFile_FilePath_Description
data.value: The storage path of the file.

data.name: WaitFile_Interval_Description
data.value: Specifies the amount of time (in milliseconds) for the file re-check. Any values out of the range of 100-20000 milliseconds is reseted to its nearest limit. The default value is 500.

data.name: WaitFile_Timeout_Description
data.value: The maximum timeout to wait in milliseconds.

data.name: WaitFile_WaitForExist_Description
data.value: Waits until the file exists.

data.name: WhenDo_Description
data.value: Executes the 'Do' block if the condition activity returns true.

data.name: WhenDo_DisplayName
data.value: When Do

data.name: WhenDo_Inverted_Description
data.value: Inverts the condition of the when test.

data.name: WhenDo_WithElse_Description
data.value: Toggles the 'Else' block activating or deactivating it.

data.name: ZipEntriesCount_Description
data.value: Returns the number of entries (files and folders) from a Zip archive.

data.name: ZipEntriesCount_DisplayName
data.value: Zip Entries Count

data.name: ZipEntriesCount_EntriesCount_Description
data.value: The number of entries (files and folders) in the zip archive.

data.name: ZipEntriesCount_ErrorMsg_OutputMissing
data.value: Please provide an output variable for at least one of the available options.

data.name: ZipEntriesCount_FilesCount_Description
data.value: Returns the number of file entries in the zip archive.

data.name: ZipEntriesCount_FoldersCount_Description
data.value: Returns the number of folder entries in the zip archive.

data.name: ZipEntriesCount_ZipFilePath_Description
data.value: The path of the zip archive.

data.name: Zip_CompressionLevel_Description
data.value: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression.

data.name: Zip_Description
data.value: Compress files into a zip archive.

data.name: Zip_FilesCount_Description
data.value: Returns the amount of files added to zip archive.

data.name: Zip_ShortEntryNames_Description
data.value: When true, reduces the entry names when it is coming from different root paths.

data.name: Zip_TextEncoding_Description
data.value: The encoding to use when writing entry names in this archive. Specify a value for this parameter only when an encoding is required for interoperability with zip archive tools and libraries that do not support UTF-8 encoding for entry names.

data.name: Zip_ToCompress_Description
data.value: The path of the file(s) or folder(s) that will be compressed. Can be a string or a collection of strings.

data.name: Zip_ZipFilePath_Description
data.value: The path of the zip archive.
